{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Global Sun |model = GL2454MP |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = -0T |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = GL2454 |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |device_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = O7J-GL2454MP-0T,KA2T1130 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = <!-- OUI -->
|chip1 = Texas Instruments;TNETW1130; |chip2 = Radia;RC2422B; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna2 = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Global Sun |manuf_model = GL2454MP-0T0 |manuf_rev = T3.0 |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/11/2003 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This device is also the wireless module for the [[Global Sun GL2454VP-0T]] (PCI).
It also serves as the wireless module for the [[D-Link DI-624+]]. :D-Link FCC ID of '''KA2T1130''' ("GL2454MP-0T0 T3.0" is silkscreened on the back of the module)
[[Global Sun GL2454MP-0T]] (T3.0) wireless module :[[Texas Instruments]] TNETW1130GVF :[[Radia]] RC2422B
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="wireless module"> File:Global Sun GL2454MP-0T top.jpg|top File:Global Sun GL2454MP-0T back.JPG|bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
